text: U se some melingoana eobae rapelang kathoko ho Allah, esere mohlaope ba tsâ€™oha ba soma Allah ka phoso le lehloeo. Ke kamoo Re entseng kateng, hore ho sechaba ka seng liketso tsa sona li bonahale li khahleha. Poelo ea bona e ho Mong`a bona, ke moo a tlang hoba bolella tseo ba neng ba tloaetse ho li etsa
